input: While a proclamation of emergency is in operation the duration of the Lok Sabha can be extended for a period

options.C: of one year at a time
options.D: of two years at a time

explanation: While a proclamation of emergency is in operation, this period may be extended by Parliament by law for a period not exceeding one year at a time.Under Article 352 the president can declare a national emergency when the security of India or part of it is threatened by war or external aggression or armed rebellion.
